title: WTB: t206 raw Hall of Famers
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTB: t206 raw Hall of Famers
posts.post_content: Hey all, would like to get some t206 HOFers in raw condition. I would like good to very good condition, unaltered and not trimmed. Would like a Joss Portrait, Lajoie, Tinker, or Walsh in particular.
